channel.title: Item bonuses
channel.description: So i tried to make an item bonus on the bandos godsword, the code looked like this... [code]item = 11963 Bandos_godsword A_kick_ass_sword. 1 1 1 50 50 50 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 25 5[/code] I knew it should work because i just simply copied the amulet of fury and change the item id, the words, and the numbers to what i wanted. It all compiles fine but when i try to get onto server it says to everyone that their character is already online. I tried couple times and same thing. After i commented out the line and compiled u could get back onto server. I think it has something to do with that the ID = 11963, i think the numbers might only go up to 7000 or whatever, just moparscape numbers. If someone knows how to fix i would greatly appreciate it.

item.title: Item bonuses
item.dc:creator: @runeshawn11 runeshawn11
item.description:
@runeshawn11 wrote:

Alright, then it should work. Otherwise, your doing something wrong. Just add the command not using the one from amulet of fury. Like type it on your own. Other than that crappy advise, idk. Im not a coder=\ just a helper.

Read full topic

item.description:
@runeshawn11 wrote:

Did you already add the 10000-20000 command in client.cfg? The one that lets you pick up the new items?

item = 11963    Bandos_godsword A_kick_ass_sword.       1	1	1	50	50	50	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	25	5
